name: $has-member
desc: The target resource (Observation or QuestionnaireResponse) is part of the information from which this observation value is derived. (e.g. calculated anion gap, Apgar score)  NOTE:  "derived-from" is the only logical choice when referencing QuestionnaireResponse.

name: $derived-from
desc: This observation follows the target observation (e.g. timed tests such as Glucose Tolerance Test).

name: $sequel-to
desc: This observation replaces a previous observation (i.e. a revised value). The target observation is now obsolete.

name: $replaces
desc: The value of the target observation qualifies (refines) the semantics of the source observation (e.g. a lipemia measure target from a plasma measure).

name: $qualified-by
desc: The value of the target observation interferes (degrades quality, or prevents valid observation) with the semantics of the source observation (e.g. a hemolysis measure target from a plasma potassium measure, which has no value).
